Html:
In the process of geting this to run on linux (all I did was update the sqllite references - brilliant!!) I noticed that the version compiled using MONO runs much slower and seems to get stuck loading tiles sometimes. Comparing the MONO and Visual Studio version both on windows I noticed that the \AppData\Roaming\GMap.NET\TileDBv3\en\Data.gmdb file is only created and accessed when using the visual studio version - even the MONO version on the downloads page doesn't work.

Is this an error with something silently failing?
i've just tested in in virtualbox with ubuntu 10.04, it somehow fails to create empty database ;/

i solved issue by checking for empty db on startup once, because sqlite in mono version somehow locks the database... Still first time takes a little more time than usual, but after that, all seems to work as good as expected, check the demo again
Purrrfect!! Runs like it should now, thanks!
